Topic.name: Topic
Topic.description: Represents a topic on a Chatter post or record.

ManagedTopicType.description: Type of managed topic. Values are: Content Featured Navigational This field is available in API version 44.0 and later.

NetworkId.description: Identifier of the Experience Cloud site to which the topic belongs. This field is available only if digital experiences is enabled in your org.

TalkingAbout.description: Number of people talking about the topic over the last two months, based on factors such as topic additions and comments on posts with the topic.
